comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: From the poster (see note), this has to be 1893. See Trove articles re the opening and closing dates - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/13902538 trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/28266828

comment.author: 29995882@N07
comment._content: Interesting.  Look at the shadows: sun is in the north-west so that means late Autumn/early Winter so around May/June... yet the sign for the RAS Show is still on the building.  Maybe they were just to lazy to take it down.  Looks like it was taken around 11 in the morning.
